attributes.action: Investigate the influence Rupert Murdoch has within the BBC
attributes.additional_details:
With the sale of half of the rights to show Formula 1 live to BSkyB and with the very real chance other channels bids where rejected.

Not to mention the suspicious move to damagingly reduce one of the networks leading viewing figures winner.

I belive an investigation needs to be undertaken to see what influence Rupert Murdoch has within the BBC, after all it seems Government and the Police are not amune to him so why should the BBC.
